product_name: Horny Toad Rollick Shirt - Women's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: Part easy care, part good looks, the Horny Toad Rollick Shirt is for women who aren't afraid to get dusty and sweaty. It's made of a fast-drying organic cotton blend with spandex for stretch. Wide scoop neck and double-layer cuffs have raw-edge detailing. Raglan sleeves allow ease of movement. Organic cotton, Tencel(R) lyocell and spandex blend features great drape and shape retention. Organic cotton is grown without the use of toxic pesticides. Closeout.
short_description: Part easy care, part good looks, the Horny Toad Rollick Shirt is for women who aren't afraid to get dusty and sweaty. It's made of a fast-drying organic cotton blend with spandex for stretch.
